name: Reddit Writing Prompts
description: Generations from GPT-2 XL with prompts taken from the [Reddit Writing Prompts](https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/tree/master/examples/stories'>Reddit Writing Prompts) dataset.

name: New York Times
description: Generations from [GROVER](https://rowanzellers.com/grover/) with prompts taken from the New York Times.
